title: September spring
creator_credit: Cinesound, World Wide Pictures, James Carr and John Haggarty
brief_description: Deals with the objects of the Snowy Mountains Hydro-Electric Authority. Includes scenes of Melbourne and Sydney, working in the Snowy area, and irrigation in the Griffith area of New South Wales.
